ðŸ“‰ Hyperliquid HYPE faces sharp correction  The Hyperliquid token is down 60% from its all-time high, prompting traders to reassess risk as market conditions evolve.  #Hyperliquid  #Crypto  #Market  #Trading  $HYPE    https://crypto-economy.com/hyperliquid-hype-plunges-60-from-ath-whats-next/

Hyperliquid $HYPE   held temporarily above the 22.00 USD level during Fridayâ€™s session, following an almost 8% drop in the previous day and marking five consecutive daily declines. Despite this short-term stabilization, downside risk remains elevated as price continues to test the key support near the October 10 low at 22.82 USD.  A decisive break below this support could accelerate selling pressure, potentially driving $HYPE   toward the February 17 low at 17.05 USD.  Technical indicators remain clearly bearish. The Relative Strength Index (RSI) stands at 25, deep in oversold territory. While RSI levels near 20 can sometimes precede a technical rebound, no confirmed reversal signals have emerged so far. Meanwhile, the MACD and signal line continue to diverge in negative territory, indicating strengthening bearish momentum.  On the upside, any recovery attempt is likely to face strong resistance near 29.37 USD, corresponding to the November 22 low.
